column2: select R.TRANSACTION_ID,convert(char(19),R.TRANSACTION_DTM,23) as TRANSACTION_DTM,R.MOBILE_NO,R.RECHARGE_AMT,R.RECHARGE_CHANNEL,R.RECEIPT_NO,R.RECORD_STATUS, R.BILLING_SYSTEM,CC.CARD_BATCH_ID,CC.CARD_SERIAL_NO,CC.BILLING_SYSTEM as CC_BILLING_SYSTEM from PMDB..PM_RECHARGE R inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH B on (R.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID) left join PMDB..PM_CASH_CARD_RECEIPT CC on (R.CARD_BATCH_ID = CC.CARD_BATCH_ID and R.CARD_SERIAL_NO = CC.CARD_SERIAL_NO)  where B.ORDER_ID = @order_id
